_meanings:
{@--2@} To be
completed, to amount to (as a 
number); {#tryAhatAH paMca paMcadaSa saMpadyaMte#}.

{@--4@} To arise, be born
or produced.

{@--5@} To fall or come 
together, unite.

{@--8@} To obtain, 
attain to, acquire, get.

{@--9@} To enter 
into, be absorbed in (with <ab>loc.</ab>).

{@--1@} To cause to happen,
bring about, produce, accomplish,
fulfil, effect; {#iti svasurBojakulapradIpaH#}
{#saMpAdya pARigrahaRaM sa rAjA#} <ls>R. 7. 29.</ls>

{@--2@} To procure, obtain, make ready,
prepare.
